type: Tutorial Step - Breaking Up The Command

definition.text: Before you get on with writting your awesome review, let me parse the command so that you understand what you just did!

paragraphs.text: docs.add: the root syntax of the Docs Add Command
Review: the Docs Page Category of the page
to: a coloquial connector to improve readability
Superalgos: the Project to which the page is added
Superalgos Project Review: the name of the collection of pages the review belongs to
->: a separator used in commands that require two user-defined parameters (in this case, the name of the collection of pages, and the name of the page)
Superalgos Review - Your Review Title: this is the Docs Page Name; we repeat Superalgos Review in the page name to lower the odds of duplicate names
